LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.0.label: слабкий біль
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.0.description: Ой... Хі-хі, я міг би до цього звикнути.
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.1.label: середній біль
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.1.description: Ой-ой... Це боляче, але мені подобається!
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.2.label: сильний біль
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.2.description: А-а-а!.. Здається, я щось зламав... Яка приємне почуття!
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.3.label: в шоці через гострий біль
LanguageData.ProsthophileNoProsthetic.stages.0.label: не має біонічних частин
LanguageData.ProsthophileNoProsthetic.stages.0.descri: Ця оболонка занадто обмежена. Якби в мене хоч мізинець був штучний.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.0.label: біонічна частина тіла
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.0.description: Я - продукт найсучасніших технологій! Я все роблю краще!
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.0.label: біонічна частина тіла
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.0.description: Вони перетворили мене на технологічну мерзоту! Якби я тільки мав вибір!
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy.stages.0.label: вогнепальна зброя
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy.stages.0.description: Агрр... ненавиджу ховатися вдалині. Я хочу власноруч зламати їм хребта!
LanguageData.ClothedNudist.stages.0.label: зайвий одяг
LanguageData.ClothedNudist.stages.0.description: Я не звик до одягу, але змушений його носити. Це невелика біда, але однак мені трохи некомфортно.
LanguageData.HappyNude.stages.0.label: голий і щасливий
LanguageData.HappyNude.stages.0.description: Я голий і мені це подобається! Я відчуваю себе вільним, невимушеним й у гармонії з природою.
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheDay.stages.0.label: night owl in daytime
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheDay.stages.0.descriptio: I don't like working during the day.
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheNight.stages.0.label: night owl at night
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheNight.stages.0.descript: I feel much better at night.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.0.label: no impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.0.description: I'm greedy. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.1.label: no impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.1.description: I'm greedy. My room is pathetic! I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.2.label: no impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.2.description: I'm greedy. My room isn't nearly good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.3.label: no impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.3.description: I'm greedy. My room isn't good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.4.label: no impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.4.description: I'm greedy. My room isn't quite good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Jealous.stages.0.label: jealous
LanguageData.Jealous.stages.0.description: Someone else has a more impressive bedroom than me!
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.0.label: awful bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.0.description: My bedroom is just how I want it to be. Very humble and simple.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.1.label: repulsive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.1.description: My bedroom is just how I want it to be. Very humble and simple.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.2.label: dull bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.2.description: My bedroom is very humble and simple. I like it.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.5.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.5.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.6.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.6.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.7.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.7.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.8.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.8.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.9.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.9.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.10.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.10.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.11.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.11.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
